nodes.text: Mazzoney was a large, dark-skinned, and very muscular four-armed humanoid over two meters tall. In addition to being the owner of Mazzoney's, Mazzoney often sold information for a price. He had two small, sharp fangs protruding upward from his lower lip, and had many scars on his forehead. He wore his hair crew length, save for an orange/yellow mohawk.
